column2: I copy. Captain speaking. Did you find the monster?
We did. Didn't even have to fight it. The corpse is dry as a… uhhh… nevermind, Captain. Anyway, looks like the creature slit its own throat.
Exactly. And we checked out the walls of its lair. There are words, they make up lines. The lines make no sense, but they rhyme. Was it trying to write poetry?
Very unusual. Okay. Bag the corpse and get it to the ship. We'll sort it out there.
